Posted By: RevShad (8/13/2012 5:10:27 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Easily a 5/5. It combos with so many things, for example: [Etched Monstrosity](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Etched Monstrosity) and [Dark Depths](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dark Depths). Now, it also is instant removal for Planeswalkers, or even getting poison/wither/-1 counters off creatures you need. It doesn't end here either, in vampire tribals, she is epic. A two drop 2/1 with first strike is good anyways, especially getting bosuses from [Captivating Vampire](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Captivating Vampire), [Vampire Nocturnus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vampire Nocturnus), and [Bloodline Keeper](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bloodline Keeper). Her ability doesn't make her tap or cost anything so it can be used right away. Such a good card. The only downside is the bb cost. I've had to adjust entire mana-scapes just to be sure to always be able to get her out in decks she's in-but it's always worth it :)
posts.html:

Now, it also is instant removal for Planeswalkers, or even getting poison/wither/-1 counters off creatures you need. It doesn't end here either, in vampire tribals, she is epic. A two drop 2/1 with first strike is good anyways, especially getting bosuses from Captivating Vampire, Vampire Nocturnus, and Bloodline Keeper. Her ability doesn't make her tap or cost anything so it can be used right away. Such a good card. The only downside is the bb cost. I've had to adjust entire mana-scapes just to be sure to always be able to get her out in decks she's in-but it's always worth it :)

posts.post_content:
I like to call her Vampire HAXmage. Few cards have abilities that at first sound so specific, but are actually so versatile. She doesn't even need to tap to activate her ability, so summoning sickness doesn't hold her back.  
  
Crack open [Dark Depths](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dark Depths) for a 20/20 indestructible flyer on turn 2 or less? Hell yeah!  
  
Strip [Mycoloth](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mycoloth) or any other +1/+1 counter-based creature naked? Hell yeah!  
  
Kill a Modular on the spot without letting him buff others? Hell yeah!  
  
Distrupt [Myojin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Myojin)s with divinity counters? Hell yeah!  
  
Reset age counters on cumulative upkeep? Hell yeah!  
  
Blow away quest counters from Ascension enchantments? Hell yeah!  
  
Set back a [Helix Pinnacle](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Helix Pinnacle) or a [Darksteel Reactor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Darksteel Reactor)? Hell yeah!  
  
Slaughter planeswalkers for (B)(B)? Hell to the yeah!  
  
Also, she's a 2/1 first strike, so she handles herself in combat fairly well for a turn 2 drop with an amazing ability.  
  
Also, if that counts for ... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
posts.html:
I like to call her Vampire HAXmage. Few cards have abilities that at first sound so specific, but are actually so versatile. She doesn't even need to tap to activate her ability, so summoning sickness doesn't hold her back.

Crack open Dark Depths for a 20/20 indestructible flyer on turn 2 or less? Hell yeah!

Strip Mycoloth or any other +1/+1 counter-based creature naked? Hell yeah!

Kill a Modular on the spot without letting him buff others? Hell yeah!

Distrupt Myojins with divinity counters? Hell yeah!

Reset age counters on cumulative upkeep? Hell yeah!

Blow away quest counters from Ascension enchantments? Hell yeah!

Set back a Helix Pinnacle or a Darksteel Reactor? Hell yeah!

Slaughter planeswalkers for (B)(B)? Hell to the yeah!

Also, she's a 2/1 first strike, so she handles herself in combat fairly well for a turn 2 drop with an amazing ability.
